christmas.subtitle: Hong Kong-style Christmas gifts and decorations
christmas.description: In Hong Kong, Christmas is a festival full of Eastern and Western cultural fusion. We offer unique Hong Kong-style Christmas products to make your holiday celebration more local.
christmas.featureDesc1: Our Christmas limited collection combines Western Christmas elements with Hong Kong local culture, creating a unique holiday experience. From decorations to gifts, each item is full of creativity and thoughtfulness.
christmas.featureDesc2: Whether you're giving them to friends and family or decorating your home, these products will make your Christmas more special.
christmas.availability: Christmas products will be available from October each year. Stay tuned!

halloween.subtitle: Halloween items combining Hong Kong local culture
halloween.description: Halloween is becoming increasingly popular in Hong Kong. We blend local Hong Kong elements with Halloween themes to create a unique festival experience.
halloween.category1Desc: Unique decorations combining traditional Chinese elements with Halloween atmosphere.
halloween.category2Desc: Creative Halloween costumes and props, blending Eastern and Western elements.
halloween.category3Desc: Halloween limited-edition toys with unique designs blending Chinese and Western cultures.
halloween.availability: Halloween products will be available from September each year. Stay tuned!

newyear.title: Lunar New Year
newyear.subtitle: Special products to celebrate Lunar New Year
newyear.description: Lunar New Year is the most important traditional festival for Chinese people. We provide a variety of beautiful New Year decorations and gifts to help you create a festive atmosphere.
newyear.category1Desc: Spring couplets, lanterns, window paper-cuts and other traditional New Year decorations to fill your home with festive atmosphere.
newyear.category2Desc: Beautifully packaged gift boxes containing various traditional candies, cookies, and tea, ideal for visiting friends and family.
newyear.category3Desc: Limited edition toys and collectibles themed around the zodiac animal of the year, making them precious souvenirs.
newyear.availability: Lunar New Year products will be available two months before the festival. Stay tuned!

hkculture.title: Hong Kong Culture
hkculture.subtitle: Explore the unique charm of Hong Kong culture
hkculture.description: Hong Kong is a unique place where Eastern and Western cultures blend, with a rich and diverse cultural heritage and modern creativity. From traditional festivals to contemporary art, from street food to fine dining, Hong Kong's cultural foundation is deep and diverse.
hkculture.ipDesc: We are committed to developing and promoting Hong Kong's local cultural IP, bringing Hong Kong's unique charm to the world through innovative design and products. We collaborate with local artists to transform elements of Hong Kong's street culture, architectural features, and culinary traditions into unique designs and products.
hkculture.travelDesc: Experience Hong Kong's unique travel culture, from bustling urban landscapes to serene country parks, from traditional temples to modern architecture. Hong Kong offers a rich variety of travel resources. We provide unique Hong Kong travel experiences and souvenirs for you to take away special memories of Hong Kong.
hkculture.category1Desc: Participate in our cultural workshops to make traditional Hong Kong crafts by hand and experience Hong Kong's cultural heritage.
hkculture.category2Desc: Learn about Hong Kong's historical changes and cultural stories through multimedia exhibitions and interactive experiences.
hkculture.category3Desc: Creative products incorporating Hong Kong elements, carefully crafted by local designers, showcase Hong Kong's creative power.

hkfestival.title: Hong Kong Festivals
hkfestival.subtitle: Explore the unique festival celebrations in Hong Kong
hkfestival.description: Hong Kong celebrates a unique blend of Eastern and Western festivals throughout the year. From traditional Chinese festivals like Lunar New Year and Mid-Autumn Festival to Western celebrations like Christmas and Halloween, each is given a distinctive Hong Kong twist.
hkfestival.category1Desc: Experience traditional Chinese festivals like Lunar New Year, Mid-Autumn Festival, and Dragon Boat Festival with unique Hong Kong characteristics and customs.
hkfestival.category2: Western Festivals with Hong Kong Flair
hkfestival.category2Desc: Discover how Western celebrations like Christmas and Halloween are transformed with local Hong Kong elements, creating a unique cultural fusion.
hkfestival.category3Desc: Learn about festivals and celebrations unique to Hong Kong, reflecting the city's rich history and cultural identity.

about.subtitle: The Story of Hong Kong Cultural Marketplace
about.missionText: Hong Kong Cultural Marketplace is dedicated to promoting local Hong Kong culture and creativity, supporting local designers and artists. We aim to provide a platform for more people to discover and appreciate Hong Kong's unique cultural products.
about.storyText1: Hong Kong Cultural Marketplace was founded in 2023 by a group of young people passionate about Hong Kong culture. We noticed that although Hong Kong has a rich cultural heritage and creative industries, there was a lack of a dedicated platform to showcase and sell these products.
about.storyText2: Therefore, we decided to create this marketplace, bringing together various unique cultural products from Hong Kong, from traditional crafts to modern designs, from local toys to festive decorations, providing consumers with a rich variety of choices.
about.value1Text: We prioritize working with local designers, artists, and manufacturers to support Hong Kong's creative industries.
about.value2Text: We are committed to preserving and promoting Hong Kong's cultural heritage, incorporating traditional elements into modern designs.
about.value3Text: We encourage innovative and unique designs, showcasing the vitality and diversity of Hong Kong's creative industries.
about.value4Text: We strictly control the quality of each product to ensure customers have the best shopping experience.
about.address: FP-20 & 24, Pottinger Street, Central, Hong Kong
about.scanQR: Scan QR code to contact us:

ipPartnerships.title: IP Partnerships
ipPartnerships.subtitle: Connecting Chinese & Global IPs with Hong Kong's Market
ipPartnerships.description: Hong Kong serves as a unique gateway connecting mainland China and international IP holders to global markets. We offer strategic partnerships to bring iconic characters, brands, and creative properties to life through high-quality souvenirs and collectibles.

mainlandIPs.title: Mainland China IPs
mainlandIPs.description: We collaborate with popular mainland China IPs to bring their beloved characters and stories to international audiences through premium merchandise and souvenirs.
benefits: Access to Hong Kong's international market with billions of tourists annually

overseasIPs.title: International IPs
overseasIPs.description: We help international brands and IP owners enter the vast Chinese market through our established distribution networks and cultural expertise.
benefits: Strategic entry into mainland China's massive consumer market
Comprehensive IP protection in Asian markets

options.title: Licensing Partnerships
options.description: License your IP for high-quality merchandise and souvenirs with guaranteed quality control and brand consistency.

options.title: Co-branded Products
options.description: Create unique co-branded products that merge your IP with Hong Kong cultural elements for unique market positioning.

options.title: Exclusive Collections
options.description: Develop exclusive, limited-edition collections for special events or seasonal promotions.

options.title: Pop-up Experiences
options.description: Create immersive retail experiences and pop-up stores featuring your IP in prime Hong Kong locations.

ipPartnerships.contactUs: Interested in partnership opportunities? Contact our IP collaboration team to discuss how we can work together.
